mod.description: The Default Config that comes with XVM

mod.name: Clan Icons
mod.description: all clan icons from 04/02/2017

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - Information Label for Missions
mod.description: This label positioned under the left PlayersPanel shows you many informations you need for missions or for your daily games too. @Examples for that are your damage, damage of your platoon members, damage of you and your platoon members together, number of enemys you spotted, number of critical hits you made, number of enemys your complete platoon killed, damage through reconnaissance and chain destruction, damage through spotting only, damage through chain destruction only, damage you got, hits you got and damage you blocked. @@Information Label for Missions by MarsOne: http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/340002-09151-omc-modpack-installer-mit-bild-video-vorschau-letztes-update-siehe-wwwodemmortiscom/page__st__4980__pid__13912513#entry13912513

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - 6th sense (xvm)
mod.description: Configure how long the 6th sense icon stays on your screen

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - Scoreboard (xvm)
mod.description: Configure how long the 6th sense icon stays on your screen

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - hitlog (xvm)
mod.description: Toggle the xvm hitlog (Shows a log of your total damage for the duration of the game)

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - total HP (xvm)
mod.description: Shows the total combined hp of each team

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - high caliber tracker (xvm)
mod.description: Shows how much damage you need to do to get high caliber

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - win chance (xvm)
mod.description: Show the percent chance of winning when you press tab

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - damage log (xvm)
mod.description: Show the xvm damage log (displays to right of damage panel (lower left)

config.name: Enable toggling of client default damagelog from game settings
config.description: Enabling this will allow you to modify the ingame damagelog and hitlog settings from the client settings window

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - last hit announcer (xvm)
mod.description: Will display a message of who just shot you and for how much

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - vehicle on fire announcer (xvm)
mod.description: Visual notification if you vehicle is on fire.@In case the fire in your vehicle isn't enough

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - total efficiency (xvm)
mod.description: Displays at the bottom left, shows spotting damage and assistance damage

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - damage panel repair timers (xvm)
mod.description: Shows a number in the picture of the damaged modules in the players panel

mod.name: Battle Results modifications (xvm)
mod.description: Show the tier of the battle (max tier)@also change which results page is displayed first when you enter the garage from the battle@page 1 is battle summary@page 2 is teams score@page 3 is your detailed battle stats

mod.name: Tank Carousel base modifications (xvm)
mod.description: Choose how many tank rows are displayed in your garage.@also enable or disable the xvm garage

config.name: Show cell, hide total used slots
Show cell, show total used slots

mod.name: PlayersPanel - start with
mod.description: Choose with which Players Panel position you will start.

mod.name: Statistics color step modifications (xvm)
mod.description: Choose which color scale you use to display player's tank stats

mod.name: Garage Interface Modifications - Clock (xvm)
mod.description: Enable or disable the clock in the garage. Also select 12 or 24 hour clock

mod.name: Garage interface modifications - gold locker (xvm)
mod.description: Prevent you from using gold in your garage

mod.name: Garage interface modifications - free xp locker (xvm)
mod.description: Prevent you from using free xp in your garage

mod.name: Garage interface modifications - default currency (xvm)
mod.description: Change the default form of currency for purchasing shells, consumables, etc.

mod.name: Garage interface modifications - tech tree free xp convert option (xvm)
mod.description: Enable an option where, when trying to research a module or tank, if you do not have enough xp, it will present you with a window to convert enough free xp to research the item

mod.name: Garage interface modifications - Crew Auto return (xvm)
mod.description: Automatically return your crew between tanks

mod.name: Garage interface modifications - removable equipment auto return (xvm)
mod.description: automatically return removable equipment

mod.name: Garage interface modifications - block vehicle if ammo is lower than... (xvm)
mod.description: Prevent you from entering a battle if you vehicle is low on ammo

mod.name: Garage interface modifications - additional server information (xvm)
mod.description: Display number of people on the server

mod.name: Marker modifications (xvm)
mod.description: Toggle the xvm markers in the game. Disabling them will enable the configurations in the game

mod.name: Login modifications - autologin (xvm)
mod.description: Automatiacly log into the game

mod.name: Login modifications - hide old replay confirmation window (xvm)
mod.description: Will not ask you if you want to confirm loading an old version replay. Will load it automaticly

mod.name: Login modifications - show server ping (xvm)
mod.description: Show server pings from the login screen

mod.name: Login modifications - save last server (xvm)
mod.description: Save the last server that you logged into

mod.name: Login modifications - show servers information (xvm)
mod.description: Show the servers population in the login screen

mod.name: Minimap modifications (xvm)
mod.description: Toggle the xvm minimap modifications@also select if the minimap, when zoomed, is shown in the center of your screen or enlarged in the lower right

mod.name: Minimap zoom modifications (xvm)
mod.description: Change the key that shows minimap zoom

mod.name: Sound modifications (Custom sounds) (xvm)
mod.description: Toggle the xvm sounds

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - Server Reticle (pmod)
mod.description: Shows where the server thinks you are aiming. Server crosshair mustbe enabled in game settings.

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - Penetration ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) Indicator (pmod)
mod.description: Shows wether or not you can penetrate an enemy, factoring in armor angles and normalization, in the form@ avg_gun_penetration/enemy_effective_armor

mod.name: Zoom modifications - zoom in (pmod)
mod.description: Allows you to change the ammount that you can zoom in.@Default zoom changes the first zoom in when you go to sniper mode@td brake allows you to change wether the tank moves when you point your gun out of gun range

mod.name: Autoaim indication

mod.description: kaeptn configs@http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/441413-0917-autoaim-indicationaddins-no-proximity-snapping-for-autoaim-but/page__st__1580__pid__13686506#entry13686506

config.name: lock shell travel distance when enemy dissapeared add-on

mod.name: Number Indicator of Armor Penetration ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) (not PMOD)
mod.description: Shows a number of chance of penetration. The number is calculated by (enemy_effective_armor-gun_average_penetration).@Negative number means likely to bounce.@Positive number means likely to pierce.

mod.name: SafeShot
mod.updateComment: Disabled "block wasted shot" because it restricts too much
mod.description: legal info@http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/599621-wg-support-safeshot-is-illegal/page__st__20__pid__13403197#entry13403197@prevents you from shooting your gun to hit allies/dead tanks/etc.

config.name: block wasted shots (shots fired into the air, ground, etc.)
send team damage message in chat

mod.name: BalCalcMod
mod.description: The mod is designed to remedy the situation where it is impossible to aim above the hill. (Overshooting)

mod.name: Wide Border of Maps
mod.description: Mod is made to help people with color blindness. The line, that indicates the border of maps, is expanded to the edges of the map. Now don't notice her is almost impossible. "Full" and "Light" differ only in the degree of compressibility. @WIDE - the border of maps is expanded to the edges of the map. INTENSIVE - the border of maps is made in the thickness of 20 pixels (on the standard = 1 pixel).@GRID - into the version "INTENSIVE" added the grid lines 10x10. EXTRAGRID - into the version "INTENSIVE" added the grid lines 50x50.@COMMAND - into the version "GRID" added the big numbering squares card. SPG - into the version "GRID" added the small numbering squares card.

mod.name: 15m Spot Circle
mod.description: Shows a 15m Circle around your tank. Its the minimum distance behind bushes if you are shooting you stay hidden. In the sniper scope ring is not displayed.

mod.name: Zoom Out Config (meters)
mod.description: How far you can zoom out in arcade mode in meters@increase scroll speed - your mouse wheel will be faster to scroll@disable gun shake - your aim will not shake when you are hit

mod.name: Crew Skill Informer
mod.description: Crew Skill Informer is WoT mod to visualize crews skills and perks meanwhile the battle. Activate it by pressing backspace

mod.name: Marking Industructable Structures
mod.description: Shows which structures can not be destroyed

mod.name: Gold Visibility Mod by lgfrbcsgo
mod.description: This mod adds a short sparkling effect to penetrating APCR/HEAT hits. Not only will you be able to tell if an enemy tank is shooting gold rounds at your allied tanks (or at you), but also if one of your allies is a gold spammer. This information will help you determining whether to engage or not to engage an enemy.

mod.name: Arty Log Extended by OldSkool
mod.description: Shows how much damage arty actually causes vs. other tanks that damage you

mod.name: Techtrees
mod.description: Vertical Techtree: shows a vertical version of the tech tree. @@Techtree Mod (with Settings in English and German): @Mainfeatures: @- 11 different Layout options (8 vertical, 3 horizontal) @- 5 graphic options @- Show hidden, removed Premium and special tanks in techtree @- Enjoy over 490 tanks in your techtree @- Nice, centered nations button bar @- Compatiblity with all screen resolutions @- In-game UI mod settings (press F8 key for Changes, press F7 key for reloading Data base) @- Allows preview and tank compare features for all tanks in game @@Because there are different options, you can style the Techtree using different combinations.

mod.description: Shows your statistics for your tanks session in the notifications area of your garage @German modified Version by dirty20067

mod.description: Shows your statistics for your tanks session in the notifications area of your garage

mod.name: Crew sounds
mod.updateComment: Grandpas:@v4.19.17 - updated to 0.9.18.0@Relhax:@Version 18@MLG Mod:@@Sounds for Crew voices:@@Julie:@updated by niserius@Monty Python:@@Romanian:@updated by niserius
mod.description: Grandpas:@Audio mod with various voices from@Duke Nukem, Team Fortress, Left 4 Dead, Minnions@and some female voices, gun reloaded notification and sixth sense sound.@Relhax:@Replaces all crew sounds with hilarious out-of-context sound bytes from people of the RELIC gaming community@MLG Mod:@Must have sound crew language set to "standard"@MLG EVERYWHERE@Also includes awesome visuals.@Sounds for Crew voices:@Mutes all crew sounds and replaces them with sounds@Julie:@Must have sound crew language set to "standard"@Monty Python:@Must have sound crew language set to "standard"@Romanian:@Must have sound crew language set to "standard"
